modmenu.summaryTranslation.reimaginedmen: Completely re-design the Create World menu.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.reimagine: Reimagined Menus reimagines the design of some of the world menus with Bedrock style menus while still maintaining the look and feel of Java!
